# Projects by Priyadharsini M V
## Banking Sector Migration
**Role:**
DevOps Engineer
**Period:**
2023-10-01 to Present
**Responsibilities:**
- Automate Migration of Onprem Applications to AWS Worked on the deployment of DC Nomad jobs to AWS Worked on the CSV Parser for Single-Tenant, Multi-Tenant and FullStack Migration which acts as a trigger point for the migration process Worked on the lambdas and stepfunctions to automate the migration of Multi-tenant applications Worked on a POC to send out notifications in Teams during the migration process using AWS Chatbot Worked on the Migration Preparation Workflow for Prod Full Satck Migration
---
## Electronics manufacturing Landing Zone setup
**Role:**
Shadow
**Period:**
2022-11-01 to 2023-04-01
**Responsibilities:**
- Deployment of infrastructure in AWS using Terraform Working on AWS resources like VPC, Transit Gateway, Network Firewall, EC2, S3, CloudWatch, Security Hub and CloudTrail CIS Level-1 Implementation using Security Hub Documentation for Network deployment, Security Hub implementation, VPC flow logs centralization, Checkov Iac Vulnerability scanning and IAM Policies Prepared a presentation on Iac Vulnerability Scanning Report for Plexus which showcases the issues and how the remediation was done
---
## Internal Generalization of cloudformation templates
**Role:**
Associate Engineer - Cloud Migration
**Period:**
2023-04-01 to 2023-05-01
**Responsibilities:**
- Worked on generalising templates for network setup including vpc, subnets, internet gateway, NAT gateway, route tables and transit gateway
---
## Internal Implementation of Azure Governance in Sandbox
**Role:**
Associate Engineer - Cloud Migration
**Period:**
2023-05-01 to 2023-06-01
**Responsibilities:**
- Worked on cost analysis and generated report for Azure sandbox governance implementation
---
## Internal Implementation of DevSecOps tools in pipeline
**Role:**
DevSecOps Engineer
**Period:**
2023-04-01 to 2023-07-01
**Responsibilities:**
- Worked on creating a generic csv file for skipping issues while performing IaC Vulnerability scanning using checkov Explored Wiz Worked on python scripts to automate csv file generation Working on integrating checkov with GitHub Actions Working on integrating checkov with Azure DevOps Completed documentation for integrating checkov with GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps
---
## Real Estate Investment Trust Company
**Role:**
DevOps Engineer
**Period:**
2023-07-01 to 2023-10-01
**Responsibilities:**
- Replicate network infrastructure in CentralUS Worked on mirroring the network resources in East US region to Central US region using Terraform in Azure Recommended automating the infrastructure deployment to the client and worked on the setup of the pipeline
